name: Haunted Train: Frozen in Time Collector's Edition
description: Thieves have stolen Charon's most powerful artifact: watches that can stop time. Now only you stand in their way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 2.5 GHZ Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1075 MB available space
